title: Foot Warmers with Heating and Vibration Massage Function, Electric Feet Warmer Fast Heating Pad Ultra Soft Flannel Fleece with 3 Settings,Durable Anti-Slip Sole,for Men and Women
features: lomitech electric heated foot warmer uses the latest heating and vibration technology.Providing efficient relief from tension, stiffness, soreness and cramps.Protect your feet from low blood circulation, arthritis, and cold floors.

ULTRA-SOFA FLANNEL:Foot Warmer both sides are constructed from super soft flannel,that is exceptionally durable and warm.The soft the thick flannel cover will keep heat inside the pad and make you warmer.

VARIETY OF USE: 3 Settings:Heat,vibrate,Heating and vibration simultaneously.Non-slip bottom material,USB power supply, whether you are at home, in the office or car, can be used for warm hands or as a travel pillow.45 minutes automatic shut-off,to prevent overheating.

CONVENIENT TO USE - The foot warmer massager is lightweight and portable, allows you relax on your sofa,bed or chair in office or home. Perfect festival,birthday, Christmas gift for Mom,Dad,friend or any your loved one.

lomitech foot warmer heating and vibration massage pad is always your sweet partner, making the day full of warmth and energy.180 days friendly customer service provide the highest customer satisfaction.
description: Product Description Foot Massage Warmer Heating and Vibration massage *Foot is the second heart of a human body. Foot is the root of human body and the key to health. *Each Lomitech Electric Heated Foot Warmer has undergone rigorous safety testing and rigorous process control. Please feel free to use it. *45 minutes automatic shut-off,to prevent overheating. *Color: Gray | Size: 14.2 x 12.2inches lomitech Electric Heated Foot Warmer - the ultimate care for your feet and your health! lomitech Electric Heated Foot Warmer *This foot warmer with heating and vibration massage function, 45 minutes automatic shut-off, a power cord that is 5.7 ft/1.74 m in length. *Modes:One-click operation, easy to use. 3 function settings.Long press the switch to turn it on or off. *Change function each time you press. Red—Heat only. Blue - Vibration only. Green - Heating and Vibration. *Power Supply: USB power supply,5V, 2A power supply is recommended.(Not included) *Item cannot be charged, requires USB connection adapter. Ultra-Soft Flannel *Foot Warmer both sides are constructed from super soft flannel,enjoy superior quality and endless comfort.All materials are BPA free and ETL certified. *Pad Material: Luxurious Flannel,Non-slip bottom material. *Auto Shut-Off Time: 45 minutes *Package Includes: 1 x lomitech Foot Warmer 1 x USB Cord 1 x User Manual
